API_Description: Adds or removes a word from the Spelling ignored-words list of the current document.

cWord.description: The word to be added or removed from the ignored list.

bIgnore.description: (optional) If true (the default), the word is added to the document ignored word list; if false, the word is removed from the ignored list.

Returns: `true` if successful. This method throws an exception if no document is open.
